title: Ssd reader Air/retina
message: I am looking for ssd reader on ebay, but cannot find nothing. Exist any ssd to usb reader? Air 2013-2017  models.

title: Ssd reader Air/retina
message: Better off getting the caddy from OWC. The controller chips do fail on the caddies, but they work good I've liked them.

title: Ssd reader Air/retina
message: Despite being $100, the OWC doesn't always recognize drives. We still end up having to put them in computers to read them half the time.

title: Ssd reader Air/retina
message: They all suck, just put them in a known good machine.
